abstract: Sweet, briny and aromatic, mussels with green coconut curry paste are the subject of this week's City Kitchen.
snippet: Sweet, briny and aromatic, mussels with green coconut curry paste are the subject of this week's City Kitchen.
lead_paragraph: I adore mussels - sweet, briny and aromatic - especially when the weather turns cool. So that's what I'm making in this week's City Kitchen.
